title: Nevves from Pernassus The politicall touchstone, taken from Mount Pernassus: whereon the governments of the greatest monarchies of the world are touched.
author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.
notes: An adaptation of: Boccalini, Traiano.  Pietra del paragone politico.
The imprint is fictitious; printed in Holland (STC).
